Product added to cart successfully Product already added to cart Are you sure .? \n Wants to update the current address Product will be available soon Months ago Day ago Days ago Hour ago Size Chart AIzaSyDLRsO_oOSnSc0pzp6MzZ0Hg7cByd7k8qo Welcome To Satvick Life असंशयं महाबाहो मनो दुर्निग्रहं चलम्। अभ्यासेन तु कौन्तेय वैराग्येण च गृह्योते।। Translation: Krishna says, undoubtedly, the mind is fickle and difficult to take control over. But O sons of Kunti, control it with practice and abstinence. In Samkhya philosophy, every being or thing in the universe has three qualities within it: sattva, rajas, and tamas. Sattva is the quality of goodness, purity, clarity, and balance. Sattva is also the root word for Satvick. Rajas is activity, impulsivity, and sometimes, confusion. Tamas refers to stagnancy and dullness. Satvick Life is the belief in sattva: harmony in the composition of our physique and in the balance of thoughts and actions. It is the practice of maintaining a pure and balanced diet, conscious and positive thinking, and it reflects in confident actions. Satvick Life, our initiative, is the result of a mother’s conviction to give her little one only the purest and best of everything. She thus became a Satvick and in less than 6 months, more than 10,000 people on Instagram shared her conviction. Now we bring you the best Satvick Gurus from across the world. You will learn to balance your diet, control your thoughts, and live a medicine free healthy life. So join the thriving Satvick Life family, speak to our Satvick Gurus at an upcoming session, book us for a private session, or invite us to your workplace and help us spread the virtue of work-life balance. Stay Satvick, Stay Healthy!
